title: Live: Mega mining company back on the cards as Glencore confirms Rio Tinto talks
full_text: Live: Mega mining company back on the cards as Glencore confirms Rio Tinto talks. Glencore has confirmed media speculation that the company is back in merger talks with Rio Tinto. Follow updates live on our business and finance blog.. In breaking news, Glencore has just sent out a statement confirming media speculation that the company is back in merger talks with Rio Tinto. Any such deal would create a mega mining company. Here… [+529 chars]
